pets.name: Kitty
pets.description:
The classic kitty will hang out with you and snuggle when you're laying down!
They'll give you passive rewards.

pets.name: Puppy
pets.description:
The classic puppy will demand constant attention and play, make sure to give them treats!
They'll give you simple tasks to earn rewards.

pets.name: Bear
pets.description:
The bear will give you constant protection and a fuzzy friend to cozy up with!
They'll help you in battles.

pets.name: Bunny
pets.description:
This little guy will hop around without a care in the world, gathering tons of veggies!
They'll automatically collect some of your items.
